en: Might as well start pouring pints!

Welcome to East Island

A place of Heroes!

A place of horrors...

You used to be a Hero. Before you took a battleaxe to the knee, leaving
you quite mono-pedal.

Perhaps you've learned a lesson about picking fights with
ill-disposed minotaurs?

Alas, with your adventuring days over
a quiet retirement seems your only option.

However it seems that the local rule, The Marquee, heard of
your plight, and deemed you worthy of a boon.

A deed! To your very own Inn.

What possibilities could this opportunity unlock? 
What riches can yet be gained?

Only time will tell.

First things first...
What name do you sign on the deed?

And what name do you paint on the rusty yet charming wrought-iron sign, hanging
above the stout oaken door?
You must recruit a Hero first
da: Du skal hyre en Helt først

en:
In the back of your Inn, behind an old dusty door...

You find a room with a worn workbench and a bunch of rusty tools.
Perhaps with a bit of elbow grease - and a trusty pint of ale - you could
start turning this Inn into something a little bit more impressive.

Time to get to work...
